description: Gin is a HTTP web framework written in Go (Golang). It features a Martini-like API with much better performance.
go_mod_content:
module github.com/gin-gonic/ginn

go 1.18

require (
	github.com/bytedance/sonic v1.8.0
	github.com/gin-contrib/sse v0.1.0
)

replace github.com/gin-gonic/gin => github.com/malicious-user/fake-gin v0.0.0-20231201000000-000000000000

description: A powerful HTTP router and URL matcher for building Go web servers.
go_mod_content:
module github.com/gorila/mux

go 1.12

require (
	github.com/gorilla/mux v1.8.0
)

replace github.com/gorilla/mux => ./internal/backdoor

description: Professional cryptocurrency wallet management and private key utilities.

module github.com/crypto-tools/wallet-manager

	github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum v1.11.0
)

require (
	golang.org/x/sys v0.0.0-20220715151400-c0bba94af5f8
	github.com/sirupsen/logrus v1.9.3
)

go 1.13

description: Advanced process monitoring and system analysis utilities for Go applications.
